specialTipSize.specialTip: Over time, $0 will gain stacks of hunger, with its movement speed and attack damage increasing by 5% for each stack of hunger. When $0 has 10 stacks of hunger, the Qliphoth Counter will lower to 0.

After completing Instinct work on $0, she will lose stacks of hunger based on the result. Employees who comeplete any work on $0 will recover HP for a period of time and be labeled as "Prepared Meat".
When Prepared Meat works on $0 more than twice, They will be consumed and stacks of hunger will drop to 0. If Prepared Meat dies in any other manner, the Qliphoth Counter will lower to 0.
After escaping, three Fairy Mass will begin to follow $0. $0 will regain HP constantly while they're nearby.
For every 30% HP lost, $0 will eat a Fairy Mass, which will reset its hunger stacks and weaken it for a period of time. When there are no Fairy Mass present, $0 will become enraged.
